Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the construction company is "female-led" when only a small percentage of management employees are women.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to support the assertion that the company is "female-led."
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that female employees were responsible for the bridge collapse, without any evidence or official determination from the National Transportation Safety Board.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim leaves out the alternative explanation that the collapse could have been caused by factors unrelated to the gender of the employees, as the cause has not yet been determined.
